- Travel to Shinjuku, Tokyo (Check into budget-friendly accommodation, 2 hours) https://www.google.com/maps?q=Shinjuku+Tokyo

Morning: - Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building (Enjoy panoramic city views, 1.5 hours) https://www.google.com/maps?q=Tokyo+Metropolitan+Government+Building

- Vegetarian Kaiseki Dinner (Savor a multi-course vegetarian meal at the Ryokan, 1.5 hours)
